Title: Requires the reporting of certain medical conditions to the department of health and the department of motor vehicles
Summary: Requires the reporting of certain medical conditions to the department of health and the department of motor vehicles.
LawCode: Add Art 20-B §§2020 - 2024, Pub Health L; amd §510, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring reporting of certain medical conditions to the department of health and the department of motor vehicles
